author: Staff Reporter
text:
A special flying squad seized sari bundles from a spinning mill owned by an AIADMK functionary near Chettinaickanpatti near here on Monday.

Acting on a tipoff, the squad raided the mill owned by Karnan, president of Seelapadi panchayat, on Nandhavanapatti Road and found 2,315 saris worth Rs.9.38 lakh. It is suspected that the saris were meant for distribution as freebies to lure voters.

The squad brought the seized goods to the Dindigul Taluk office for further investigation. Cases have been registered in this connection.

It is owned by an AIADMK functionary near Chettinaickanpatti
title: Sari bundles seized from mill
